title: Unnai Kan Thedhudhe Lyrics-Va Quarter Cutting song lyrics
stanzas:
Singer  : GV Prakash Kumar, Gana Ulaganathan 
Song   : Unnai Kan Thedhudhe
Movie : Va Quarter Cutting
Lyrics : Kumararaja, Shiva

Unnai kan thedhudhe ullam nadudhe
Unnai kan kanaamal paradhodudhe
Kudi kudiyai theriyumadeee...
Aanalum kudika pidikumadi ..
Mabbu kicku boostu takkaru
Quarteru matter kidakalaye ..
ahre haayiiii..

Unnai kan thedhudhe ullam nadudhe
Unnai kan kanaamal paradhodudhe

Kalyaani ragam illa
Iyaiyaiyo pichu pichu odharuraye
Samiyaarthan yaagamilla
Pinni poo vachi ribbon kooda suthuraye

Kalyaani ragam illa
Samiyaarthan yaagamilla
Maanidar thaan yedhayum kandukala

Kele thatti mele thirugi
Adhuthan sorgam pogum vali
Kunijan pirandhu nimindhan manushan
Pidicha gnana purusanadee.
Mabbu kicku boostu takkaru
Quarteru matter kidakalaye ..
ahre haayiiii..

Unnai kan thedhudhe ullam nadudhe
Unnai kan kanaamal paradhodudhe
Kudi kudiyai theriyumadeee...
Aanalum kudika pidikumadi ..

Ye quarter quarter quarter quarter quarter ..
Ye quarter quarter quarter quarter quarter..
